name: 206 Burger Company
popular: 206 Burger: 1/4-pound fresh natural beef, avocado, bacon, cheddar cheese
unique: Masala Cheeseburger: 1/3-pound of beef marinated in Indian spices, your choice of cheese, house aioli sauce

name: 8oz Burger & Co.
popular: The 8oz.: Black Angus beef patty, arugula, balsamic onions, hills bacon, beecher's flagship cheddar, truffle aioli
unique: Banh Mi: lemongrass-marinated pork and beef patty, pickled daikon, pickled carrots, cilantro, cucumbers, serrano peppers, sriracha aioli
fries: Fries, specialty fries, tater tots, onion rings

name: Bent Burgers
popular: The Thing: crumbled bleu cheese, candied bacon, fried egg, caramelized onion
unique: The Bent Burger: Two grilled-cheese sandwiches as buns with candied bacon, cheese, a hotlink, a fried egg
fries: Fries, specialty fries, tater tots, onion rings

name: Blue Moon Burgers
popular: The Double Cheeseburger Love: two 1/4-pound beef patties, ketchup, mustard, cheddar, pickles on a brioche bun
unique: Extensive gluten-free options, plus a vegan option
fries: Fries, specialty fries, tater tots, onion rings
cutline: The Blue Hawaiian (Courtesy Blue Moon Burgers)

name: BRGR Bar Seattle
popular: Bacon Brie: beef patty, center-cut bacon, melted brie, caramelized pear or apple (seasonal), arugula, sweet date aioli
unique: Gangnam Again: Korean BBQ style inspired marinated kalbi, caramelized kimchi, house creamy-slaw, house sauce
cutline: Buttermilk Fried Chicken burger (Courtesy BRGR Bar Seattle)

name: Burger and Kabob Hut
popular: Chicken Masala Burger: marinated chicken, herbs, spices, Swiss cheese
unique: Mosa Burger: Three beef patties, turkey bacon, fried egg

name: Burger Brawler
popular: Brawler Burger: prime dry-aged chopped steak blend, melted taleggio cheese
unique: Katsu Hog Burger: pork patty, Beecher's Marco Polo cheese, katsu sauce, mayonnaise, cabbage, pickled eggplant

name: Burger Madness
popular: Cowboy: smoked bacon, two onion rings, cheddar cheese, Sweet Baby Ray's BBQ sauce
unique: "Stack 'em high" challenge: finish a five-plus patty stack combo meal in 30 minutes or less for a picture in the hall of fame; finish a 12-stack in 30 minutes for a gift certificate
fries: Fries, specialty fries, tater tots, onion rings

name: Burger Town
popular: California Burger: 1/3-pound fresh chuck patty, Swiss cheese, bacon, avocado, lettuce, tomato, pickles, red onion, house sauce
unique: Town Burger: 1/2-pound natural Angus patty, Swiss & pepper jack cheese, grilled mushrooms/onions, lettuce, tomato, pickles, house sauce

name: Burgermaster
neighborhood: Greenwood, Laurelhurst, Bellevue, Mill Creek, Everett, Mount Vernon
popular: Burgermaster: beef patty, American cheese, tomato, lettuce, relish
unique: Grilled Crab & Swiss: Dungeness crab mixed with mayonnaise and swiss cheese

name: Cloud 9 Burgers
popular: Sweet Rain Burger: bacon, cheddar cheese, avocado, fig jam, lettuce, tomato, pickle, red onion, garlic aioli, house dressing
unique: Mac 'n' Cheese Bites and seasonal milkshake flavors

name: Coastline
popular: Classic: American cheese, ketchup, mustard, house Dijon mayo, lettuce, tomato, dill pickle
unique: Spicy Sriracha: Sriracha, cream cheese, grilled onions, pepper jack, iceberg lettuce, Roma tomatoes

name: DeLuxe Bar & Grill
popular: Ultimate BOA: fresh Angus patty, apple wood bacon, lettuce, tomato, onion, avocado, white cheddar
unique: Open since 1962
cutline: Five Alarm burger (Courtesy DeLuxe Bar & Grill)

name: Dick's
neighborhood: Wallingford, Broadway, Edmonds, Queen Anne, Lake City, Crown Hill
popular: Deluxe: Double 1/8-pound beef patties, melted cheese, lettuce, mayonnaise, pickle relish
unique: They've mostly stayed the same over their 64 year history; the burger you get today is the same one your grandma or grandpa got years ago. (However, the Deluxe and Special were added in the early seventies.)

name: Feed Co. Burgers
popular: Classic Feed Burger: 4-ounce beef patty, Quinn's special sauce, romaine lettuce, tomato, pickles
unique: Bim Burger: Shiitake mushrooms, scallions, ginger beef patty, pickled daikon, bok choy, kimchi aioli

name: Giddy Up Burgers & Greens
popular: Giddy Up: 1/3-pound patty, bacon, pepperjack cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickled jalapeños, fire sauce
unique: The Kickin' Fried Chicken: House-made pickled fried chicken, lettuce, tomato, mayo, buffalo sauce, pickled jalapeños
fries: Fries, specialty fries, tater tots, onion rings
cutline: Giddy Up burger (Courtesy Giddy Up Burgers & Greens)

name: Great State Burger
neighborhood: Laurelhurst, Downtown, Chinatown International District, Sodo
popular: Single: organically raised, grass-fed beef, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, State Sauce
unique: Their cows run fence-free in the mountains of northern Washington and eat grass from day one till day done.

name: Just Burgers
popular: California Burger: beef patty, Swiss cheese, avocado, honey-cured bacon, romaine lettuce, tomato, secret House sauce
unique: Bulgogi Burger: thinly sliced Angus beef brisket with soy-based bulgogi sauce (limited quantity — marinated for at least 6-12 hours before serving), lettuce, tomato, Swiss cheese, mayonnaise

name: Katsu Burger
popular: Ninja Deluxe: pork loin katsu, bacon, cheddar cheese, house-made Tonkatsu sauce, house-made sweet Japanese mayo
unique: Mt. Fuji: beef katsu, natural chicken katsu, pork katsu, egg, bacon, cheddar cheese, American cheese, pepperjack cheese, wasabi mayo, spicy mayo, Tonkatsu sauce
cutline: Mt. Fuji burger (Greg Gilbert / The Seattle Times)

name: Kidd Valley
neighborhood: U District, Kenmore, Green Lake, Kirkland, Renton, Downtown, Sodo, Bitter Lake
popular: Double Bacon Cheeseburger: two 1/4-pound beef patties, American cheese, tomatoes, pickles, lettuce, Kidd Valley relish spread
unique: They feature a burger special every two to three months.

name: Li'l Woody's
neighborhood: South Lake Union, Ballard, Capitol Hill, White Center
popular: Big Woody: 1/3-pound Painted HIlls grass-fed beef, bacon, cheddar cheese, onions, pickles, tomato, lettuce, ketchup, mayonnaise
unique: The Fig and the Pig: 1/3-pound Painted Hills grass-fed beef, homemade pickled figs, bacon, crumbled blue cheese
cutline: The Fig and the Pig (Courtesy Li'l Woody's)

name: Loretta's Northwesterner
popular: Tavern Burger: charbroiled beef, melted cheese, pickles, onions, special sauce
unique: It's a 21+ establishment
cutline: Tavern Burger (Greg Gilbert / The Seattle Times)

name: Lunchbox Laboratory
neighborhood: South Lake Union, Bellevue, Redmond, Gig Harbor
popular: Burger of the Gods: American Kobe beef, crumbled bleu cheese, candied balsamic onions, Super Gorgonzola Spread
unique: They serve Boozie Shakes, like the Cinnamon Toast Crunk (Snoqualmie vanilla ice cream, Cinnamon Toast Crunch with a test tube spike of Sinfire Cinnamon Whiskey)
fries: Fries, specialty fries, tater tots, onion rings
cutline: Burger of the Gods (Courtesy Lunchbox Laboratory)

name: PICK-QUICK Drive In
popular: Deluxe Double Cheeseburger: lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, PICK-QUICK sauce
unique: The business started in Fife in 1949.
cutline: Deluxe Double Cheeseburger (Courtesy PICK-QUICK Drive In)

name: Red Mill Burgers
popular: Bacon Deluxe with Cheese: pepper bacon, lettuce, tomato, pickle, red onion, American cheese, Mill sauce
unique: This is their 24th year in the neighborhood.
cutline: Bacon Deluxe with Cheese (Courtesy Red Mill Burgers)

name: Scooter's Burgers
popular: Bacon Cheese: Scooter sauce, lettuce, pickles, tomato, onion by request
unique: Shakes are local, from Liberty Distributing in Puyallup.

name: The Little Chicken Burger
popular: Hard to say; people customize their own burgers.
unique: They serve churros.
cutline: Double Burger (Courtesy The Little Chicken Burger)

name: Tipsy Cow Burger Bar
popular: The Rockstar: 7-ounce grass-fed beef patty, brew battered & fried bacon, maple syrup drizzle, Beecher’s Flagship White Cheddar, fried organic egg, caramelized sweet onion, lettuce, tomato, Tipsy Sauce
unique: They have 42 local beers on tap and serve “tipped” (boozy) shakes.
cutline: The Rockstar (Courtesy Tipsy Cow Burger Bar)

name: Uneeda Burger
popular: The Classic Burger: 1/4-pound Painted Hills beef patty, romaine, tomato, pickles, special sauce
unique: Sonora: 6-ounce beef patty, roasted chili relish, jack cheese, cilantro

name: Wallyburger
popular: Dirty Dan: 1/3-pound patty, deep-fried jalapeños, housemade spicy cheddar queso & Texas lemon sauce
unique: People come from all over for the vegan burger.

name: Wibbley's
popular: Bacon Cheese Burger: Charbroiled fresh ground chuck, Wibbley’s Dressing, American cheese, bacon, lettuce, tomato, pickles
unique: Century Burger: Charbroiled fresh ground chuck, mayonnaise, blue cheese crumbles, bacon, sprouts, tomato

name: Zippy's Giant Burgers
popular: Zip Burger with bacon and cheese: Zippy's secret sauce, tomato, pickles, red onion, lettuce
unique: King Lou Lou: four patties, eight pieces of bacon, lettuce, grilled onion, quadruple cheese, chipotle mayo, tomato, topped with Lil' Zip with cheese crown
fries: Fries, specialty fries, tater tots, onion rings
cutline: The Last Gasp (Courtesy Zippy's Giant Burgers)
